price: (75) And there is nothing concealed[1085] within the heaven and the earth except that it is in a clear Register.[1086]
arabic: وَمَا مِنۡ غَآئِبَةٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَٰبٖ مُّبِينٍ
footnotes:
[1085]- Literally, "absent [from the senses]."
[1086]- The Preserved Slate (al-Lawḥ al-Maḥfūẓ), which is with Allāh (subḥānahu wa taʿālā).

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: wamā min ghāibatin fī al-samāi wal-arḍi illā fī kitābin mubīnin
